text: Halifax Town Hall is a grade II listed, 19th century town hall in Halifax, West Yorkshire, England. It is notable for its design and interiors by Charles Barry and his son, Edward Middleton Barry, and for its sculptures by John Thomas. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Halifax Town Online: Address and phone number of Town Hall. * Hathi Trust: Building News and Engineering Journal vol 5, 28 January 1859, p.82, "The new town hall at Halifax" Category:1861 architecture Category:Halifax, West Yorkshire Category:Town halls
title: Halifax Town Hall
